text: (atarku) avar kurinar; "(ennutaiya) camukattavarkale! Nan ennutaiya iraivanin telivana attatci mitu iruppataiyum, avan tannitamiruntu enakku alakana akara vacatikalai alittu iruppataiyum ninkal arivirkala? (Akavekarka yar,) nan etai vittu unkalai vilakkukinreno, (ataiye nanum ceytu unkal nalanukku) maru ceyya nan virumpavillai. Ennal iyanra varaiyil (unkalin) cir tiruttattaiyeyanri veretaiyum nan natavillai; melum, nan utavi peruvatu allahvaik kontallatu verillai, avanitame poruppuk kotuttirukkiren; innum avan pale milukiren
